review_discussion.author: CohenCyril
review_discussion.comment: The phrasing `[seq E | i <- s & j <- t i]` has the advantage to explicit the dependency of `i` in `t`, do you think it would rather be kept implicit in the doc?

review_discussion.author: thery
review_discussion.comment:
From finset
[set E | x in A, y in B] == the set of values of E for x drawn from A and 
                                        and y drawn from B; B may depend on x.

commits.author: CohenCyril
commits.message: Adding allsigs, the dependent version of allpairs
